feature_model.name: CFDP_Library
feature_model.feature_tree: :r CFDP_Library (CFDP_Library) :g [1, *] : Receive (Receive) :o receive_fs_operations (receive_fs_operations) :o pus_rename (pus_rename) :o Receive_Acknowledged_Mode (Receive_Acknowledged_Mode) :o pus_copy (pus_copy) : Pus (Pus) :o reboot_pus (reboot_pus) : send (send) :o Send_Acknowledged_Mode (Send_Acknowledged_Mode) :o send_fs_operations (send_fs_operations) : Reboot (Reboot) :o Reboot_Entity (Reboot_Entity)
feature_model.constraints: constraint_1:~pus_copy or Pus constraint_2:~pus_copy or send constraint_3:~pus_rename or Pus constraint_4:~pus_rename or send_fs_operations constraint_5:~reboot_pus or Reboot
